casebody.data:
Nuss, Appellee, v. Hand-Craft Cleaners et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Nuss v. Hand-Craft Cleaners (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 9.]

(No. 98-2091 Submitted September 15, 1999 Decided October 13, 1999.) Oldham & Dowling and Raymond C. Mueller, for appellant Hand-Craft Cleaners.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for further proceedings on the authority of Denham v. New Carlisle (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 594, 716 N.E.2d 184.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
